components.title: Active Directory Forest  ()
components.description: Active Directory Forest  () based on DOD SRG/STIG.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ac-6.10.

implemented-requirements.description: Update access to the directory schema must be restricted to appropriate accounts.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement au-8.1.

implemented-requirements.description: The Windows Time Service on the forest root PDC Emulator must be configured to acquire its time from an external time source.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-6.

implemented-requirements.description:
Changes to the AD schema must be subject to a documented configuration management process.
Anonymous Access to AD forest data above the rootDSE level must be disabled.
Membership to the Schema Admins group must be limited.
